students.name: Sophie Graham
students.feedback: This course is very useful to improve my English skill. Especially, Words in a sentence are grouped by meaning and then it is pronounced. I think it is very good to improve my English skills.

students.name: Minnie Clark
students.feedback: I just finished this course, and I think it's very helpful for people who wants to improve their speaking skills. I can recomommend for everyone. I'm planning to continue with intermediate ti advance course. I wish all learners success.

students.name: Wyatt Vasquez
students.feedback: This course is great for beginners, very intensive and interactive. You can use the target language in a given context and practice it many times.
